affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.
notes:
This ability hits Spell Immune units.
This ability destroys trees.
cmb:
120/120/120/120
13
lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
name: beastmaster_wild_axes

desc: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.
attrib:
HAWK HEALTH: 40/60/80/100
HAWK MOVEMENT SPEED: 250/275/300/325
HAWK DAY SIGHT RANGE: 700/1000/1300/1600
HAWK NIGHT SIGHT RANGE: 700/800/900/1000
HAWK DURATION: 60/60/60/60
cmb:
15
40
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild

desc: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.
attrib:
BOAR HEALTH: 200/300/400/500
BOAR ATTACK DAMAGE: 15/30/45/60
BOAR MOVEMENT SLOW: 10%/20%/30%/40%
BOAR ATTACK SLOW: 10/20/30/40
BOAR POISON DURATION: 3
BOAR DURATION: 60/60/60/60
cmb:
15
40
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar

desc: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
name: beastmaster_inner_beast

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.
attrib:
STUN DURATION: 3/3.5/4
DAMAGE: 200/250/300
SHOUT WIDTH: 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 50%/50%/50%
ATTACK SLOW: 50/50/50
SLOW DURATION: 2/3/4
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 950/950/950
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 45/45/45
cmb:
150/175/200
80/75/70
lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
name: beastmaster_primal_roar
